welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Warrenton, the charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. Happy travels!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as the primary hub for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves international flights and is connected to the main terminal via an underground walkway.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights and is connected to the main terminal via a mobile lounge system.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights and is connected to the main terminal via an underground walkway.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
